game.title: The Mysterious Shrine
game.objective: Speak to the Oracle in the Forest of Whispers
game.description: The Oracle holds the key to unlocking the ancient shrine.

task.objective: Speak to Gavric in Ironwood Village
task.description: Gavric will provide you with instructions on finding the Forest of Whispers.

task.objective: Reach the Oracle's Hideout in the Forest of Whispers
task.description: Follow the clues Gavric gave you to reach the Oracle.
task.location: Deep within the Forest of Whispers, near the Whispering Pool

task.objective: Speak to the Oracle and receive your reward
task.description: The Oracle will reward you for completing the quest.
